news: [Community] Importing HTTP request submitted by @secfb. When released it should be easier to import from other tools like burp (bless you)
[True story, bro] This tool is for my own purpose only, you must not use it. And do not ask for improvement, the tool must stay as-is for ever
[GUI] Putting your hand on a GUI makes you look smart? No. Do not use GUI, use CLI instead like everyone else
[DNS strategy] You're a security expert? Again no, but give a try to the new DNS strategy, you can test it locally without any domain
[Java] Latest release v0.113 is still compatible Java 11, next release v0.114 will then require Java 21 so prepare and bump your jdk
[Exploit] Give also a try to RCE, UDF and reverse shell and share your thoughts, injection can lead to a shell too
[RCE shell] How to RCE shell and reverse shell with one-click? For details go to https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Exploit
[Pinned] Report any bugs and thoughts, and add your star at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Reminder] Do not use this tool, it makes you look weird clicking this and scrolling that. Grow up and use your keyboard on a CLI
[Community] @secfb also asks for easier target param selection. You win, it will be the very last feature coded. Next I remake everything in python and bump to 1.0
